course_description: An examination of modern America as a legacy of the New Deal and World War II. Attention given to political, diplomatic, economic, and sociocultural aspects, with emphasis on reform traditions, national security concerns, and presidential leadership.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4325, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Ashmore, Status: Closed
